asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

draggable.description:
Whether the bottom sheet content is draggable.
If false, the bottom sheet can only be dragged by the grabber.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the bottom sheet when the escape key is pressed.

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the bottom sheet when the outside is clicked.

closeThreshold.description: The threshold distance for dismissing the bottom sheet.

defaultActiveSnapPoint.description: The default active snap point of the bottom sheet.

defaultOpen.description: The initial open state of the bottom sheet.

finalFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the sheet is closed.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  backdrop: string
  content: string
  trigger: string
  grabber: string
  grabberIndicator: string
  closeTrigger: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the bottom sheet. Useful for composition.

initialFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the sheet is opened.

modal.description: Whether to prevent pointer interaction outside the element and hide all content below it.

open.description: Whether the bottom sheet is open.

preventDragOnScroll.description: Whether to prevent dragging on scrollable elements.

preventScroll.description: Whether to prevent scrolling behind the sheet when it's opened

restoreFocus.description: Whether to restore focus to the element that had focus before the sheet was opened.

snapPoints.description:
The snap points of the bottom sheet.
Array of numbers or strings representing the snap points.

swipeVelocityThreshold.description: The threshold velocity (in pixels/s) for closing the bottom sheet.

trapFocus.description: Whether to trap focus inside the sheet when it's opened.
